name: Aleksey Chernov
routine: Aleksey Chernov sleeps at 12am and wakes at 7am to walk his dog.
occupation: Aleksey is a computer security analyst who works a standard 9 am to 5 pm day.
thoughts: He is anxious about a server breach his company faced and has been working extra hours since February 1st, 2024, to resolve the situation.
lifestyle: He prefers hearty Russian meals, relaxes by ice fishing on weekends, and has a functional and straightforward home setup.

name: Amir Patel
routine: Amir usually goes to sleep by 10:30 pm and wakes up at 5:30 am for his morning run.
occupation: Amir Patel is a financial analyst for a multinational corporation, often working from 9 am to 6 pm in his downtown office.
thoughts: Amir has been contemplating investing in cryptocurrency and spent the evening of 2024-02-03 researching the latest market trends.
lifestyle: Amir is a fitness enthusiast who enjoys meal prepping and follows a strict dietary plan; he seldom eats out.

name: Jia Li
routine: Jia Li typically sleeps at 11:30 pm and wakes at 6:30 am to practice tai chi.
occupation: She manages a traditional Chinese medicine clinic and works from 8 am to 6 pm.
thoughts: Lately, she's been pondering about ways to integrate technology into her practice to reach more people, especially after reading a relevant article on February 1st, 2024.
lifestyle: Jia Li enjoys a balance of yin and yang in her diet, practices meditation, and always brews herself a pot of oolong tea while working.

name: Raakel Vartiainen
routine: Raakel sleeps at around 12am and wakes up at 7am, then cycles to her studio.
occupation: Raakel is a graphic designer in Helsinki, typically working from 9 am to 5 pm at a local firm.
thoughts: She's excited about her new freelance project which will start rolling out on February 2nd, 2024, but also a bit nervous about balancing the additional workload.
lifestyle: Raakel prefers minimalistic living, enjoys foraging and cooking with locally-sourced ingredients, and loves to unwind with indie music on vinyl.
